statements.statement: SELECT count(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = #value#

create table PhotometricGainNewTb ( WaveLength int Not Null Primary key, Wave340Value int Not Null, Wave405Value int Not Null, Wave445Value int Not Null, Wave484Value int Not Null, Wave510Value int Not Null, Wave549Value int Not Null, Wave574Value int Not Null, Wave600Value int Not Null, Wave663Value int Not Null, Wave700Value int Not Null, Wave748Value int Not Null, Wave795Value int Not Null )

create table PhotometricGainOldTb ( WaveLength int Not Null Primary key, Wave340Value int Not Null, Wave405Value int Not Null, Wave445Value int Not Null, Wave484Value int Not Null, Wave510Value int Not Null, Wave549Value int Not Null, Wave574Value int Not Null, Wave600Value int Not Null, Wave663Value int Not Null, Wave700Value int Not Null, Wave748Value int Not Null, Wave795Value int Not Null )
create table ManualPhotometricCheckTb ( WaveLength int Not Null Primary key, offset int Null, Gain int Null, Voltage float Null, Absorbance float Null )
create table UserInfoTb ( UserID char(20) Not Null Primary Key, UserName char(20) Not Null, UserPassword char(50) Not Null, CreateTime datetime Not Null )
create table UserAuthorizationTb ( UserID char(20) Not Null, AuthorizationKey char(20) Not Null, Constraint PK_UserAuthorization primary key (UserID, AuthorizationKey) )
create table ApplyDepartmentTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, Department char(20) Not Null )
create table ApplyDoctorTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, Doctor char(20) Not Null )
create table InspectDoctorTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, Doctor char(20) Not Null )
create table AuditDoctorTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, Doctor char(20) Not Null )

create table ConfigurationTb ( IsSamPanelBarOpen tinyint Not Null Default 0, IsReaPanelBarOpen tinyint Not Null Default 0, IsHandBarOpen tinyint Not Null Default 0, ReagentOpen char(20) Not Null Default 'close' )
create table ReagentTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key Not Null, ReagentPos char(20) Not Null, ReagentChamber char(20) Not Null )
create table MaintainLogTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, UserName char(20) Not Null, LogDetails char(100) Not Null, LogDateTime datetime Not Null )
create table LoginLogTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, UserName char(20) Not Null, LogDetails char(100) Not Null, LogDateTime datetime Not Null )
create table OperateLogTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, UserName char(20) Not Null, LogDetails char(100) Not Null, LogDateTime datetime Not Null )

create table AlarmLog ( ID int auto_increment primary key, FaultCode char(20) Not Null, AlarmReason char(50) Not Null, LogDetails char(100) Null, AlarmLevel char(20) Not Null, UserName char(20) Not Null, LogDateTime datetime Not Null, IsSolve tinyint Not Null )
create table VersionInfoTb ( SerialNum char(20) Not Null, LicenseKey char(20) Not Null, ValidDate datetime Not Null )

create table AssayProjectInfoTb
(
ProjectName char(20) Not Null,
SampleType char(10) Not Null,
ProFullName char(20) Null,
ChannelNum char(20) Null,
Constraint PK_AssayProject primary key (ProjectName, SampleType)
)

create table AssayProjectParamInfoTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, AnalysisMethod char(20) Null, MeasureLightDot1 int Null, MeasureLightDot2 int Null, MeasureLightDot3 int Null, MeasureLightDot4 int Null, MainWaveLength int Null, SecWaveLength int Null, InstrumentFactorA float Null, InstrumentFactorB float Null, ComStosteVol float Null, ComSamVol float Null, ComDilutionVol float Null, DecStosteVol float Null, DecSamVol float Null, DecDilutionVol float Null, IncStosteVol float Null, IncSamVol float Null, IncDilutionVol float Null, DilutionType char(20) Null, FirstSlope float Null, SecondSlope float Null, FirstSlopeHigh float Null, SecondSlopeHigh float Null, ProLowestBound float Null, ProHighestBound float Null, Pmp1 int Null, Pmp2 int Null, Pmp3 int Null, Pmp4 int Null, BoundDirection char(20) Null, Limit1 float Null, Limit2 float Null, LimitValue float Null, ReactionDirection char(10) Null, StirringIntensity char(10) Null, LevelConcentration char(10) Null, Constraint PK_AssayProject primary key (ProjectName, SampleType) )

create table CalibrationParamInfoTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, CalibrationMethod char(20) Not Null, Point int Null, Span int Null, AbsLimit float Null, DuplicatePercent float Null, DuplicateAbs float Null, SensitivityHigh float Null, SensitivityLow float Null, BlankAbsHigh float Null, BlankAbsLow float Null, CalibrationTimes int Not Null, AutoCalibration tinyint Not Null, AutoCalibMask tinyint Not Null, CalibLotCheck tinyint Null, CalibValidDateCheck tinyint Null, ReagentLotCheck tinyint Null, ReagentValidDateCheck tinyint Null, QCFailed tinyint Null, Constraint PK_AssayProject primary key (ProjectName, SampleType) )

create table RangeParamInfoTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, AutoRerun tinyint Not Null, TechnicalLimitLow int Null, TechnicalLimitHigh int Null, RepeatLimitLow int Null, RepeatLimitHigh int Null, QCDefaultContainer char(10) Not Null, CalibDefaultContainer char(10) Not Null, SerumAgeLow1 int Null, SerumAgeHigh1 int Null, SerumManConsLow1 float Null, SerumManConsHigh1 float Null, SerumWomanConsLow1 float Null, SerumWomanConsHigh1 float Null, UrineAgeLow1 int Null, UrineAgeHigh1 int Null, UrineManConsLow1 float Null, UrineManConsHigh1 float Null, UrineWomanConsLow1 float Null, UrineWomanConsHigh1 float Null, SerumAgeLow2 int Null, SerumAgeHigh2 int Null, SerumManConsLow2 float Null, SerumManConsHigh2 float Null, SerumWomanConsLow2 float Null, SerumWomanConsHigh2 float Null, UrineAgeLow2 int Null, UrineAgeHigh2 int Null, UrineManConsLow2 float Null, UrineManConsHigh2 float Null, UrineWomanConsLow2 float Null, UrineWomanConsHigh2 float Null, SerumAgeLow3 int Null, SerumAgeHigh3 int Null, SerumManConsLow3 float Null, SerumManConsHigh3 float Null, SerumWomanConsLow3 float Null, SerumWomanConsHigh3 float Null, UrineAgeLow3 int Null, UrineAgeHigh3 int Null, UrineManConsLow3 float Null, UrineManConsHigh3 float Null, UrineWomanConsLow3 float Null, UrineWomanConsHigh3 float Null, SerumAgeLow4 int Null, SerumAgeHigh4 int Null, SerumManConsLow4 float Null, SerumManConsHigh4 float Null, SerumWomanConsLow4 float Null, SerumWomanConsHigh4 float Null, UrineAgeLow4 int Null, UrineAgeHigh4 int Null, UrineManConsLow4 float Null, UrineManConsHigh4 float Null, UrineWomanConsLow4 float Null, UrineWomanConsHigh4 float Null, SerumDefaultSex char(5) Not Null, SerumDefaultAgeLow int Null, SerumDefaultAgeHigh int Null, UrineDefaultSex char(5) Not Null, UrineDefaultAgeLow int Null, UrineDefaultAgeHigh int Null )
create table CombProjectInfoTb ( CombProjectName char(20) Not Null primary key, ProjectName int Not Null )

create table CalcProjectInfoTb ( CalcProjectName char(20) Not Null primary key, CalcProjectFullName char(20) Not Null, Unit char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, ReferenceRange char(50) Null, CalcFormula char(50) Not Null )

create table EnvironmentParamTb ( ReactionDiscTemp float Not Null, ReagentDiscTemp float Not Null, CuvetteBlankLow float Not Null, CuvetteBlankHigh float Not Null, ReagentSurplus float Not Null, ReagentLeastVol float Not Null, AbluentSurplus float Not Null, AbluentLeastVol float Not Null )

create table ReagentNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb ( ReagentNeedle char(20) Not Null, PolluteSourcePro char(20) Not Null, BePollutedPro char(20) Not NUll, CleaningLiquidName char(20) Not Null, CleaningLiquidUseVol float Not Null, CleanTimes int Not Null )

create table CuvetteAntifoulingStrategyTb ( PolluteSourcePro char(20) Not Null, R1CleanLiquidType char(20) Null, R1CleanLiquidUserVol float Null, R1CleanTImes int Null, R2CleanLiquidType char(20) Null, R2CleanLiquidUserVol float Null, R2CleanTImes int Null )
create table SampleNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb ( PolluteSourcePro char(20) Not Null, CleanLiquidType char(20) Null, CleanLiquidUserVol float Null, CleanTImes int Null )
create table ResultUnitTb ( ID int auto_increment Not Null primary key, Unit char(20) Not Null )
create table NetworkCommunicationTb ( IPAddress char(20) Null, NetworkPort char(10) Null, StartingUp tinyint Not Null, Reconnection tinyint Not Null, RealTimeSendResult tinyint Not Null )

create table SerialCommunicationTb
(
SerialName char(10) Null,
BaudRate int Null,
DataBits int Null,
StopBits int Null,
Parity int Null,
CommunicateionType char(10) Null, CommunicateionOvertime float Null,
ReConnectionTime float Null,
StartingUp tinyint Not Null,
Reconnection tinyint Not Null,
RealTimeSendResult tinyint Not Null
)
create table QualityControlTb ( QCName char(20) Not Null Primary key, LotNum char(20) Not Null, Pos char(10) Not Null, InvalidDate datetime Not Null, HorizonLevel char(10) Not Null )

create table QCRelationProjectTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, QCName char(20) Not Null, TargetMean float Not Null, TargetSD float Not Null, constraint FK_QCName foreign key (QCName) references QualityControlTb(QCName) )

create table QualityControlResult ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, QCName char(20) Not Null, ActualMean float Not Null, ActualSD float Not Null, CVValue float Not Null, StartTime datetime Not Null, QCReason char(128) Not Null )

create table QCReactionProcessTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, QCName char(20) Not Null, QCTime datetime Not Null, CUVNO int Not Null, CuvBlkWm float Null, CuvBlkWs float Null, Cuv1Wm float Null, Cuv1Ws float Null, Cuv2Wm float Null, Cuv2Ws float Null, Cuv3Wm float Null, Cuv3Ws float Null, Cuv4Wm float Null, Cuv4Ws float Null, Cuv5Wm float Null, Cuv5Ws float Null, Cuv6Wm float Null, Cuv6Ws create table CalibratorTb ( CalibName char(20) Not Null primary key, Pos char(10) Not Null, LotNum char(20) Not Null, InvalidDate datetime Not Null )

create table CalibratorProjectTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, CalibName char(20) Not Null, CalibConcentration float Not Null, constraint FK_CalibName foreign key (CalibName) references CalibratorTb(CalibName) )

create table CalibrationResultTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, CalibMethod char(20) Not Null, CalibratorName char(20) Not Null, BlankAbs float Null, KFactor float Null, AFactor float Null, BFactor float Null, CFactor float Null, CalibAbs float Null, CalibrationState char(50) Null )

create table CalibrationReactionProcessTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, CalibName char(20) Not Null, CalibTime datetime Not Null, CUVNO int Not Null, CuvBlkWm float Null, CuvBlkWs float Null, create table ReagentSettingsTb ( Pos char(10) Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Null, ReagentName char(20) Null, ReagentType char(10) Not Null, ReagentChamber char(20) Not Null, ValidDate date Not Null, Barcode char(50) Null, ReagentContainer char(10) Not Null, BatchNum char(20) Not Null, Locked tinyint Not Null )

create table ProjectReagentStateTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, R1Name char(20) Null, R1Pos char(10) Null, R1TestQuantity int Null, R1SurplusQuantity int Null, R2Name char(20) Null, R2Pos char(10) Null, R2TestQuantity int Null R2SurplusQuantity int Null, )

create table ReagentStateTb ( ReagentPos char(10) Not Null, ReagentChamber char(20) Not Null, ReagentName char(20) Null, ProjectName char(20) Null, ReagentUsedVol float Null, ReagentSurplusVol float null )

create table PatientInfoTb ( SampleNum int Not Null, SampleID char(20) Null, PatientName char(20) Null, Age int Null, BirthDate date Null, Sex char(10) Null, NativePlace char(50) Null, ApplyDepartmentTb char(20) Null, ApplyDoctor char(20) Null, BedNum char(20) Null, SamplingTime datetime Null, InspectDoctor char(20) Null, AuditDoctor char(20) Null, CaseNum char(20) Null, InspectTime datetime Null, AttendingDoctor char(20) Null, HospitalizationNumber char(20) Null, Telephone char(20) Null, SendInspectTime datetime Null, ClinicalDiagnosis char(128) Null, Remarks char(128) Null )
create table SampleResultStateTb ( SampleNum int Not Null, InspectTime datetime Not Null, AuditState char(10) Null, PrintState char(10) Null )

create table SampleTb ( SampleNum int Not Null, CreateTime datetime Not Null, SampleState char(10) Null, SamContainer char(10) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, Barcode char(50) Null, PanelNum int Not Null, SamplePos int Not Null, SampleDilute char(10) Not Null, DilutedVol float Not Null, IsOperateDilution tinyint Not Null, IsEmergency tinyint Not Null, IsPrinted tinyint Not Null, IsSend tinyint Not Null )
create table SampleResultTb ( SampleNum int Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, ConcResult float Null, StartTime datetime Not Null, IsResurvey tinyint Not Null, Remarks char(128) Null )
